mapper.insert: INSERT INTO festival(fes_name, fes_start_date, fes_end_date, fes_location, fes_latitude, fes_longitude, fes_fee_status, fes_fee, fes_age, fes_enroll_date, fes_operator, fes_url, fes_poster, fes_view_count, season_code, category_code) VALUES(#{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{place}, #{lat}, #{lot}, #{feeStatus}, #{fee}, #{age}, #{enrollDate}, #{operator}, #{hmpgUrl}, #{poster}, #{viewCount}, #{season}, #{category})
